html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04352018-04-20,  ,  ,  ECCC, 
ActWild Animal and Plant Protection and Regulation of International and Interprovincial Trade Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Wild Animal and Plant Trade Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the WILD ANIMAL AND PLANT TRADE REGULATIONS in order to (1) prevent the introduction of the fungal disease, Bsal, into Canadian ecosystems by prohibiting the importation of all species of salamanders, unless authorized by a permit; and (2) replace the temporary, one-year restriction that has been in place since May 12, 2017 and will expire on May 11, 2018.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0081 Publication Date: 2018-05-02
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Wild Animal and Plant Protection  and Regulation of International  and Interprovincial Trade Act
subject: Regulations Amending the Wild Animal and Plant Trade Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the WILD ANIMAL AND PLANT TRADE REGULATIONS in order to (1) prevent the introduction of the fungal disease, Bsal, into Canadian ecosystems by prohibiting the importation of all species of salamanders, unless authorized by a permit; and (2) replace the temporary, one-year restriction that has been in place since May 12, 2017 and will expire on May 11, 2018.
